attributes.action: Fairness for England & Justice for England's Tax-Payers & Citizens.
attributes.additional_details: Research has revealed England is highest taxed country in the U.K.Since the 1890's & the 1970's citizens in Scotland enjoying Free Benefits: FREE Care for the Elderly-forced to sell their homes in England,FREE University Tuition-England's students pay up to £9,000 annually,FREE Anti-Cancer drugs & treatments worth thousands- too expensive in England,EMA Allowance worth £1,560 scrapped in England, FREE Prescriptions worth £7.40 each,FREE parking at NHS hospitals,FREE milk & school meals. NO TOLL-CHARGING of road crossings anywhere in Scotland yet M25 Dartford Crossing tolls are still charging motorists & cause pollution,Water meters are compulsory for home moves only in England.Cuts to services like libraries affect mainly England only.An England citizen is worth up to 25-35% less than a Scottish, Welsh or N.I.citizen. We are demanding spending equal to Scotland for England or cut in Scottish,Welsh & Irish funding to England''s levels-we are all supposed to be a United KIngdom.
